metadata.title: Simply Said, INC Rustic Frames, Leave Worries & Shoes at The Door-10"x10" Wood Sign RF1209
features: Wooden plaque reads "Leave your shoes and worries at the door."
REAL WOOD, RUSTIC FINISH - Crafted with care and pride. The rustic finish somehow adds to the sincerity of the message.
HANG IT ON A WALL, REST IT ON A SHELF – This inspirational framed sign measures 10” x 10” x 1.5” so it’s easy to hang on your wall or, if you prefer, sit on a desk or shelf.
A THOUGHTFUL GIFT – We can all use support and inspiration from time to time. Share this with a friend or family member to show you care and that they’re in your thoughts.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA – All of Simply Said’s Rustic Frames are handcrafted in the United States in Simply Said’s family-owned shop.
description: Each handcrafted Rustic Frame from Simply Said, INC offers an artfully distressed farmhouse look. The rustic wood frame creates a beautiful contrast with the design, printed on a wood surface. Handcrafted in the USA. This primitive-style decor will complete the look of any space within your home. Constructed to hang or sit on your favorite shelf! Measures approximately 10 x 10 x 1.5 inches.
